ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: This happened to two friends of mine on the same zone, its likely they were taking damage at zone time.  They were zoning from Highpass into Kith this AM.  A
ygData.messageBody:
This happened to two friends of mine on the same zone, its likely
they were taking damage at zone time. They were zoning from Highpass
into Kith this AM. A warrior and a cleric.

It also happened to me zoning from E Commons to W Commons.

They dropped into a random place in Kithicor (at night) and being
mid-teens were promptly slaughered by undead. :(

I wasn't on yet, and a necro did a corpse locate for them from
*inside* the tunnel to zone and told them they must be "in the wall"
since thats how he was facing. <gah>

When I got on I was able to find thier corpses (and it was day). But thats
three cases in the last 24 hours ... new bug?

Melodie on Brell
Menuette on Luclin
